Instruction: Start by preheating the oven to 325 degrees Fahrenheit (165 degrees Celsius).
Combine cornmeal, sugar, flour, lemon juice, vanilla, and margarine in a medium bowl. Add eggs and mix well. Stir in coconut and pecans. Pour the mixture into the pie crust.
Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 50 to 55 minutes, ensuring to cover it with foil. Remove the foil during the last 10 to 15 minutes of baking.
The pie may seem a bit jiggly when taken out of the oven, but it will solidify as it cools.
